title: Something's terribly wrong....
body:
I couldn't record it but... In my last Aram game, i was playing poppy, everything was in slow motion, litteraly... I don't know how, or why.
Later, i played a game, as Zed, and at first, when we got in, everyone was invisible, the only thing i could see were my idle particles. I close the game and relog... I spent 2 mins in the loading screen, waiting at 100% with your new loading indicator spinning... I shut down the client completly and relog. Then finaly got to play the game, or so i thought.... I could only move, there were no units but only champions and i couldn't cast ANY spells, only move around. I exit again and reload... And then, finaly, after 6  mins or so, i get to normaly play the rest of the game.... Riot... what is this? My ping was at 77-89 the whole time...

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having some problems staying connected to the game, so it can't transmit information happening.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to know for sure and find out what exactly is going on.  The results will also provide some steps to get it fixed up.  Let me know what you find!

Well, it looks like it fixed itself on it's own 2 hours later. no idea what it was... had never happened before and hasn't happened again since.
Funny thing was, even the enemy spells traveled in slow motion and some didn't hit me when i sidesteped, as if the actual game and the visuals were off sync... well, since it's not happening anymore, i guess everything is ok
